title: ‘Design Mom’ Gabrielle Blair Pivots to Politics
description: After 16 years of making a name for herself as a blogger and home decor expert, Design Mom has written her manifesto — about reproductive health.
dc:creator: Kase Wickman
media:credit: Matthew Avignone for The New York Times
media:description: Gabrielle Blair, 48, also known as Design Mom, sits in her study at home in Argentan, France. Her family has been restoring the 17th century house since 2019.
